title: A lack of clarity on the bioeconomy concept might be harmful for Amazonian ecosystems and its people
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 224

Author(s): Joice Ferreira, Emilie Coudel, Ricardo Abramovay, Jos Barlow, Rachael Garrett, Alexander C. Lees, Marie-Gabrielle Piketty, Roberto Porro, Ima Vieira, Kieran Withey
